detail_desc: Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Short, off-the-shoulder, straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and pockets in the side seams. Unlined.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with a chest pocket, long sleeves and roll edges.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and an adjustable hook and loop tab. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
One-shoulder blouse in airy cotton poplin with an elasticated top and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Large metal clip earrings with faceted plastic stones and sparkly stones. Length approx. 10 cm.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend. Seam with fringing at the top that continues down the sleeves.
Metal hair clips, four patterned, two glittery and four in a solid colour. Size 4 cm.
Wide, knee-length kimono in a patterned viscose weave with a shawl collar with twisted ties at the bottom, long, wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, side pockets and a fringed hem. Lined.
Joggers in a fine-knit, supersoft viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waistband, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Short skirt with a soft, felted finish, a high waist, concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Lined.
Short skirt with a soft, felted finish, a high waist, concealed zip in one side and side pockets. Lined.
Adjustable braces in herringbone-patterned elastic with metal fasteners.
Bra in organic cotton jersey with scalloped trims and lightly padded, opening cups with space for nursing pads. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Weekend bag in cotton canvas with imitation leather details. Detachable, adjustable shoulder strap and two handles with a detachable card holder, a zip at the top and two inner compartments, one with a zip. Lined. Size 19x37x52 cm.
Alice band with soft faux fur ears, and a decoration in the shape of a padded unicorn horn with tulle.

Baby Exclusive. Top in lightweight, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a round neck that has a button at the back. Long raglan sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs and a gently rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Bootees in an organic cotton knit.
Baby Exclusive. Bootees in an organic cotton knit.
Baby Exclusive. Bootees in an organic cotton knit.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in a double-layered, textured organic cotton weave with adjustable braces that cross at the back and button at the front. Elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Baby Exclusive. Hairbands in a textured organic cotton weave with a bow.

Shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and a flap with a tassel and concealed magnetic fastener. One inner compartment. Imitation suede lining. Size 10.5x24x32 cm.
Long metal earrings with pendants with flowers and plastic rods in different lengths. Length approx. 17 cm.

Handbag in imitation leather with decorative metal details and zips, and two adjustable handles at the top with metal fasteners. One large compartment with four inner compartments, one with a zip and one with a twist lock. One open inner compartment. Lined. Size 15x25x35 cm.
Blouse in an airy modal and cotton weave with hole embroidery at the top, short, elasticated raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Blouse in an airy modal and cotton weave with hole embroidery at the top, short, elasticated raglan sleeves and a gently rounded hem.
Short jersey skirt with concealed elastication at the waist.

Set with a bow tie and braces. Adjustable elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in patterned satin with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Set with a bow tie and braces. Adjustable elasticated braces with metal fasteners and imitation leather details. Pre-tied bow tie in patterned satin with an adjustable fastening at the back.
Maxi skirt in an airy weave made from a viscose blend with an elasticated drawstring waist and gently flared skirt with seams and gathers to add width. Unlined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing, an adjustable hook and loop tab at the top, appliqué on the tongue and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Push-up bralette in lace with moulded, padded cups for light lift and a fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a wide lace trim at the hem and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Padded gilet in woven fabric with a zip down the front and lined hood with an elasticated drawstring. Zipped side pockets and an elasticated drawstring at the hem. Lined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with worn details that are patched on the inside. Adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Blouse in wide wale corduroy made from a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket and wide sleeves with buttons at the cuffs.

Shaping briefs in microfibre with a light shaping effect on the waist. High waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back. Laser-cut edges around the legs for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with short, flounced sleeves and a wide neckline with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck. Seam with wide elastication and ties at the waist. Unlined.
